name: Basic AI SEO KW Research n8n DataForSEO Gumroad 030125

parameters.content:
## Get Related Keywords from DataForSEO and Save to Google Sheet

Http request made to DataForSEO to get related keywords of the main keyword. Results save in the Google Sheet created earlier in the workflow.

## Get Keyword Suggestions from DataForSEO and Save to Google Sheet

Http request made to DataForSEO to get suggested keywords based on the main keyword. Results save in the Google Sheet created earlier in the workflow.

## Create New Folder, Copy Template, and Set Fields
Create a new folder and a sheet (from the template) with the main keyword in the folder and sheet file name.

Get main keyword, location, language and limit from the original sheet.

# Setup

## 1. Create a folder in your Google Drive. 
### Name it: Basic AI SEO Keyword Research n8n and DataForSEO.

## 2. Copy this Google sheet to your:
### Basic AI SEO Keyword Research n8n and DataForSEO folder. 
https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1NKjF5_OKVx3Rptdd86GjHK9tAplMKyv2IHtjsBjOU7s/edit?usp=sharing

**Make sure to remove "copy" from the filename.**

## 3. Create DataForSEO Account
[DataForSEO](https://app.dataforseo.com/?aff=184208)

# How to use 
https://youtu.be/4t8sSf2JNA4

## 1. Add Your DataForSEO and Google Account Credentials 

## 2. Enter the Main Keyword (that you want to research), Location, Language, and Limit in the Main Keyword sheet.
There should only be one row with the above information. If you change the location and language it must align with DataForSEO requirements for this data. 
Refer to DataForSEO api endpoint documentation for more information: https://docs.dataforseo.com/v3/dataforseo_labs/google/related_keywords/live/?bash

## 3. Enter New Main Keyword in Template Keyword Research with DFSEO 010425.1

### IMPORTANT

Enter the a keyword that you want to research each time you run the workflow. Only one keyword can be researched at time.

## 4. You Can Change the Folder and Template Names

### Important
If you change the folder and template names, be sure to update the workflow references to Google Drive and Google Sheets

folderId.cachedResultName: Basic AI SEO Keyword Research n8n and DataForSEO

parameters.name: ={{ $('Google Sheets KW Research Template').item.json['Main Keyword'] }} Keyword Research {{ $now.format('MMddyy') }}

parameters.content:
# Wayne Ergle

### Thank you for downloading this keyword research workflow!

Visit my website to learn more about WebXco services. https://www.webxco.ai/

Visit my YouTube channel for a comprehensive overview on how to use this workflow as well as other n8n related content.

### Products Used 
[DataForSEO](https://app.dataforseo.com/?aff=184208)
Google Drive
Google Sheets

# This Workflow

This workflow utilizes the DataForSEO platform to perform keyword research for a given keyword. 

The data includes related keywords, keyword suggestions, keyword ideas, Google Autocomplete, subtopics, top SERP results, and Google People also Ask.

Consider the workflow as the basis to build comprehensive keyword research and strategies. Explore the DataForSEO api endpoint documents and you will find an incredible amount of data is provided.
